Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: iOS sensor visualization dashboard

- Next.js 14 app with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
- Three visualization modes: numeric, charts, and map
- Real-time accelerometer (x, y, z) readings
- GPS tracking with coordinates, altitude, speed, heading
- iOS Safari permission handling for DeviceMotionEvent
- Recharts for live data visualization
- Leaflet map with position tracking and path history
- shadcn/ui components for theming
- Responsive mobile design
- Throttled sensor updates (10Hz accel, 1Hz GPS)
